001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
004
005import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges.LetterGradeRange;
006import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges.LetterGradeRange.InvalidLetterGradeRange;
007import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.Student.Section.GRADUATE;
008import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.Student.Section.UNDERGRADUATE;
009import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
010import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.*;
011import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertThrows;
012
013public class GradeBookTest {
014
015  @Test
016  public void defaultLetterGradeRanges() {
017    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
018    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges undergrad = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
019    assertDefaultLetterGradeRanges(undergrad);
020
021    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges grad = book.getLetterGradeRanges(GRADUATE);
022    assertDefaultLetterGradeRanges(grad);
023  }
024
025  private void assertDefaultLetterGradeRanges(GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges) {
026    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.A, 94, 100);
027    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.A_MINUS, 90, 93);
028    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.B_PLUS, 87, 89);
029    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.B, 83, 86);
030    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.B_MINUS, 80, 82);
031    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.C_PLUS, 77, 79);
032    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.C, 73, 76);
033    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.C_MINUS, 70, 72);
034    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.D_PLUS, 67, 69);
035    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.D, 63, 66);
036    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.D_MINUS, 60, 62);
037    assertLetterGradeRange(ranges, LetterGrade.F, 0, 59);
038  }
039
040  private void assertLetterGradeRange(GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges, LetterGrade letterGrade, int minimum, int maximum) {
041    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(letterGrade);
042    assertThat("No range for " + letterGrade, range, not(nullValue()));
043    assertThat("Less than for " + letterGrade, range.maximum(), equalTo(maximum));
044    assertThat(range.minimum(), equalTo(minimum));
045  }
046
047  @Test
048  public void minimumValueGreaterThanMaximumValue() {
049    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
050    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
051    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.A);
052    assertThrows(InvalidLetterGradeRange.class, () ->
053      range.setRange(100, 99)
054    );
055  }
056
057  @Test
058  public void minimumValueEqualsMaximumValue() {
059    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
060    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
061    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.A);
062    assertThrows(InvalidLetterGradeRange.class, () ->
063      range.setRange(99, 99)
064    );
065  }
066
067  @Test
068  public void defaultLetterGradeRangesAreValid() {
069    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
070    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
071    ranges.validate();
072  }
073
074  @Test
075  public void rangesDoNotStartAtZero() {
076    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
077    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
078    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.F);
079    range.setRange(2, range.maximum());
080    assertThrows(InvalidLetterGradeRange.class, ranges::validate);
081  }
082
083  @Test
084  public void rangesDoNotContain100() {
085    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
086    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
087    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.A);
088    range.setRange(range.minimum(), 99);
089    assertThrows(InvalidLetterGradeRange.class, ranges::validate);
090  }
091
092  @Test
093  public void rangesAreContiguous() {
094    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
095    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
096    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.A);
097    range.setRange(range.minimum() + 1, range.maximum());
098    assertThrows(InvalidLetterGradeRange.class, ranges::validate);
099  }
100
101  @Test
102  public void rangesAreContiguousNotARange() {
103    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
104    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
105    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.C);
106    range.setRange(range.minimum(), range.maximum() - 1);
107    assertThrows(InvalidLetterGradeRange.class, ranges::validate);
108  }
109
110  @Test
111  public void scoreIsInRange() {
112    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
113    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges ranges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(UNDERGRADUATE);
114    LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.A);
115    range.setRange(90, 100);
116
117    assertThat(range.isScoreInRange(90.0), is(true));
118    assertThat(range.isScoreInRange(100.0), is(true));
119    assertThat(range.isScoreInRange(95.0), is(true));
120    assertThat(range.isScoreInRange(89.5), is(true));
121    assertThat(range.isScoreInRange(101.0), is(false));
122    assertThat(range.isScoreInRange(89.0), is(false));
123    assertThat(range.isScoreInRange(89.4), is(false));
124
125  }
126
127  @Test
128  public void scoresAreCorrectlyMappedToLetterGrades() {
129    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
130    assertThat(book.getLetterGradeForScore(UNDERGRADUATE, 99.0), equalTo(LetterGrade.A));
131    assertThat(book.getLetterGradeForScore(UNDERGRADUATE, 93.0), equalTo(LetterGrade.A_MINUS));
132  }
133
134}
